author: James Van Straten, AI Boost
title: K33 Executes First Bitcoin Purchase Under New Treasury Strategy
description: The initial 10 BTC acquisition signals long-term commitment to bitcoin integration, said the Sweden-based digital asset brokerage and research firm.
content: James Van Straten is a Senior Analyst at CoinDesk, specializing in Bitcoin and its interplay with the macroeconomic environment. Previously, James worked as a Research Analyst at Saidler & Co., a… [+406 chars]
